amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds to implement or execute any non-treaty executive agreement with Russia regarding missile defense or to provide Russia with information about America's ballistic missile defense system.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 72 printed in House Report 113-170 to prohibit funds from this Act to be used to implement or execute any agreement with the Russian Federation concerning the missile defenses of the United States.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Brooks (AL) amendment (A063) Agreed to by voice vote.
